remarks: A useful equivalence related to substitution.  (Contributed by NM, 5-Aug-1993.)  (Revised by Mario Carneiro, 3-Oct-2016.)  (Proof shortened by Wolf Lammen, 6-Feb-2018.)
statement:
equsex.1 $e |- F/ x ps $.
equsex.2 $e |- ( x = y -> ( ph <-> ps ) ) $.
equsex $p |- ( E. x ( x = y /\ ph ) <-> ps ) $.
